channel.title: HTA on bubka hacks stuff
channel.description: Recent content in HTA on bubka hacks stuff

item.title: HTB-oBfsC4t10n
item.description: A phishing HTML file masquerading as an invoice delivers a macro-enabled Excel workbook that drops and executes a multi-stage obfuscated HTA payload, ultimately injecting a reverse shell shellcode into rundll32.exe and establishing a C2 connection.

item.title: Metasploit: office_word_hta
item.description: A malicious RTF document exploits CVE-2017-0199 via an embedded OLE2Link object to fetch and execute a remote HTA payload from an attacker-controlled server.
